rextendr 0.4.2
  • Reference
    • Using Rust code in R packages

    • Setting up a Rust build environment
  • Changelog

Call Rust code from R using the 'extendr' Crate

Source: R/rextendr.R
rextendr.Rd

The rextendr package implements functions to interface with Rust code from R. See rust_source() for details.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://extendr.rs/rextendr/

  • https://github.com/extendr/rextendr

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/extendr/rextendr/issues
